Honestly, it's MUCH better for this many dresses to reserve a place in my schedule just for your wedding. If the bridesmaids order individually, then they'll get inserted in my schedule here and there, in-between other weddings I'm doing.  It also helps to avoid any color difference due to different dye lots. █ What is the best way to organize each bridesmaid’s measurements and style of dress?  Here is an example of one of my previous buyers' notes. You can use this as a sample. Once you have all the information collected, you can simply "copy" and then "paste" to "Note to Etsy Store"/Order Notes when you check out.  https://i.etsystatic.com/icm/476284/180663007/icm_fullxfull.180663007_8q9prln00sw8wkog0g0c.pdf?version=0 █ Can this dress be made without rosettes? Can we add straps, flowers, sleeves? Can we combine designs from two different dresses? Yes, we're very flexible. But please double-check with me first. There is an extra fee for a style change ($5-$10)  The better way is this: If the dress is not exactly what you want, then send me a dress design with the exact final look you want (it doesn't matter if it's from other source or an edited photo), and we will let you know if we can make it or not. █ How do I indicate the size and color information, etc.?  You can add an optional message (size, color, or other custom) to me in the "Note to Etsy Store" section. If you do not know where this section is, then please check Step 2 in the following link: http://www.etsy.com/help/article/339 █ Can this dress be made in a different color? Yes, we have over 60 colors. Here is the color chart:  https://www.etsy.com/listing/203324524/swatches-book-of-chiffon-with-over-120?ref=shop_home_active_2&crt=1 █ How long will it take to make my dress(es)-? Normally 4-6 weeks, varies by season. If it’s the busy season, then the turnaround time will be longer. Check the following link for updated turnaround times (please check “Shipping Time”)  https://www.etsy.com/shop/RenzRags?ref=l2-shopheader-name#policies █ Are your dresses able to be tailored/altered once I receive them? Yes, I make the dresses with extra fabric inside so they can be easily let out. We have created a PDF file for this, with exact instructions. Feel free to request the PDF if you want to see it.  █ Does this dress look better in a certain type of chiffon? Can you help me decide among 75D chiffon, Velvet chiffon, and 100D chiffon? We have different types of chiffon, more because different girls like different types of chiffon, and not because some dresses look better in a certain type of chiffon. So the dress you choose can be in any type of chiffon we offer.  █ Can you supply any kind of swatch? Such as chiffon, sequin, Soft Tulle and lace. Please check the possibility as follows: Chiffon (swatch available):  https://www.etsy.com/listing/203324524/swatch-book-of-chiffon-with-over-120?ref=shop_home_active_1  Sequin (swatch available):  https://www.etsy.com/listing/256942372/bigger-swatch-pieces-for-sequined-fabric?ref=shop_home_active_2 Soft Tulle (swatch NOT available):  https://www.etsy.com/listing/244033824/swatch-book-for-soft-tulle-with-over-130?ref=shop_home_active_12 Velvet (swatch available): https://www.etsy.com/listing/648283408 Lace (swatch NOT available) : https://img0.etsystatic.com/068/0/6300657/il_570xN.784728750_3miw.jpg °º©©º°¨¨¨¨¨¨°º©©º°¨¨¨¨¨¨°º©©º°¨¨¨¨¨¨ ▓▓▓ 【CONTACT 】 ▓▓▓ If you have any questions, please send us a message in Etsy Conversations. We will reply to all questions within 24-48 hours. °º©©º°¨¨¨¨¨¨°º©©º°¨¨¨¨¨¨°º©©º°¨¨¨¨¨¨
